titles.title: A bill to reauthorize provisions in the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 relating to Native Hawaiian low-income housing and Federal loan guarantees for Native Hawaiian housing.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 109-221.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 374.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs by unanimous consent.
Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

calendar.text: Ordered placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 390.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/16/2006--Reported to Senate without amendment. Amends the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 to authorize appropriations to the Department of Housing and Urban Development for FY2006-FY2009 for grants for housing assistance to Native Hawaiian families eligible to reside on the Hawaiian Home Lands, including rental assistance for low-income housing.
